text: Belnapia moabensis is a Gram-negative, aerobic, facultatively fermentative and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Belnapia which has been isolated from biological soil crusts in the United States. ==References== == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Belnapia moabensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodospirillales Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Belnapia moabensis
